questions.question: Who is Frodo Baggins?
questions.answer: He is a Hobbit who carried THE RING from the Shire to Mount Doom and destroyed it there.

questions.question: who is the nephew of bilbo baggins?
is frodo the nephew of bilbo
Who is Frodo Baggins' best friend
Who is Sam Gamgee?
questions.answer: A Hobbit from the Shire and Frodo Baggins' best friend.

questions.question: Who is Gandalf?
questions.answer: A wizard, also called Istar. He watches over Middle-Earth. (And is a troublemaker.)

questions.question: Who is Elrond?
questions.answer: Elrond is the Elven-Lord living in Rivendell.

questions.question: Who is Arwen?
questions.answer: Arwen is the daughter of Elrond.

questions.question: Who is Aragorn?
questions.answer: Aragorn is the heir of Isildur, he is a member of the Fellowship Of The Ring and the future king of Gondor.
